name: Memoru
description:
Search for answers in the past of your strange companion, explore a mysterious place, climb impossible structures and escape the destruction that collapses around you.

Unravel the secrets of the bitter past of your company.

Memoru is a 2d platform game with puzzle elements and breakout sessions, with focus on narrative.

Memoru is a project by DOO group for the 3rd semester of the game design bachelor degree at UAM.

Controls:

To move press AD/Arrows:

To jump press W/Space/UpArrow:

To push or pull hold Ctrl:

To use Telekinesis hold left mouse button:

You can press "R" to restart from the last checkpoint.
